LA PAVONI JOLLY GRINDER



JDL GRINDER & BL BASE

La Pavoni coffee grinder and doser JDL brings the aroma of freshly ground coffee into your home by making espresso and cappuccino like those found at an authentic Italian coffee bar. The coffee grinder has a coffee bean hopper of 250 gram capacity and enables a wide coffee grind adjustment. The container for the ground coffee can be taken out for easy cleaning. This grinder is fitted with a dosing device supplying the correct quantity of ground coffee for one cup.
 
La Pavoni base BL features a coffee grounds drawer with filter bumper and fits all lever and pump driven machines with grinder.
   
   
TECHNICAL DATA
COFFEE GRINDER
Bean hopper Capacity 250gr
Ground coffee container capacity 150gr
Voltage 110V, 60 Hz
Absorption 95W
Dimensions (cm) (WxDxH) 13.5x25x30.5
Weight (kg) 4.5
Colours available Black and chrome
BASE
Dimensions (cm) (WxDxH) 51.5x36x7
Weight (kg) 2.6
The manufacturer reserves the right to modify the appliances without further notice.
